file_content.text: Not speaking, not trading. Jawas not doing business now.
Nothing else for you. No trade!
I've cleared the path. Your band should be able to travel, now.
Yes--we hear good messages from scouts, all in place. Good trade--we give you droid knowing.
Stop now! Long fight stop now. Too few Jawas. Too few blasters.
Droids came from big wreck. Very old wreck. Lost now. Jawa collectors found it--Kitit, Nbat and Efa.
Wreck was from strangers' transport module--big travel in and out of sand. Found droids, bones, salvage. Good things.
The transport module--what "strangers" did it belong to?
Strangers?
Big strangers, like you. Came, went to desert. Used transport to travel.
Keep going.
You'll get your paws on everything, won't you?
You scavengers disgust me.
Jawas scavenge, hunt, trade. This is Jawa living.
Wreck is gone now, eaten by sand. Strangers gone, too--don't know where strangers gone.
Wreck parts already sold, traded... but not this. Take lockbox from wreck. Very secure. Slightly broken. Maybe you want it?
You've done well, Jawa.
Excellent work.
If it contains the secrets of Czerka, I'll take it.
It could be useful.
I'm sure I can find a way to get the box open.
I'll get inside it.
I guess it might be worth something.
Sure. Why not?
Good. Very good trade, then!
Have you investigated the lockbox yourself?
What's inside?
Tried breaking it, but very sturdy. After long suns, it goes in back of sandcrawler with junk. Until now!
Don't think you can pawn junk off on me.
Is this a scam?
Not junk. You wanted droid knowing, we give you droid knowing--and salvage from droid wreck.
Take good travel, fast, past long suns. Trade Master Thint wishes you good!
Now you have droid knowing, and you have lockbox. Trade is complete, yes? You travel home, leave Jawas? Kill no more Jawas?
I'm through with you.
Good. Jawas done. Trade Master Thint sees you on your long travel.
You've caused me trouble. I want tribute sent to me, or I'll return.
Pay me reparations.
Tribute. Yes? Yes--no returning, Jawas will send many good trade items back to you. Good trade. No killing.
Trade Master Thint sees you going under long suns, long travel. Good travel!
I'll do whatever I care to--including killing Jawas.
No promises.
Yes. You will? Yes. Jawas will not bother you further. You want trade, ask for trade. Jawas will leave you now....
Clear sandcrawler path, and soon!
More Jawas coming. Not defeat now!
Speak to clans. Tell them we move very soon. Quickly, quickly!
Jawa--I have parts here from a droid you sold. I need them identified.
Hmm? Droid parts? Stranger go home, go away.
Big travel to sand, long suns, very big distance to travel today. Getting ready to leave soon. Can't trade now.
Just take a quick look. I won't keep you from your work.
It won't take long.
Tt. Maybe. Quick bargain, maybe trade, maybe not.
Look at this as an opportunity to work with the Empire. You might come out ahead.
This'll be worth your while.
It seems my tone was too polite.
Don't you dare ignore me!
Reminder: Jawas many here, outsiders very few. Hmm. Quick look, maybe trade. Will see.
Tch. This is old droid. You want to know what is? How Jawas salvaged? Big cost, skill trade.
For droid knowing, help clear path for sandcrawler. Desert dangerous, Jawa lives precious, moving quickly. Fair trade.
You're going to tell me what I need, or you're dead.
No deal [Attack].
Jawas against outsiders, now. Many, many Jawas. Won before... win again!
I clear your path, and you tell me what I need.
All right. We trade.
Very glad! Clear path, help Jawa clans.
Return soon, before long suns set, shadows grow. Then we give you the droid knowing.
No business now. Trade season over!
